p: Concentrations of 10 7, 10 6, 10 4, and 10 3 copies/Î¼L of standard plasmids were chosen to perform three runs and measure intra- and inter-assay variation in the form of %CV. The CV values were almost lower than 1% with a few value ranging from 1% to 3% ( Table 3 ) indicating good repeatability and high accuracy.
